Class UserResource

    • update

    • login

      @POST @Path("login") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response login(@FormParam("username") String username, @FormParam("password") String password, @FormParam("code") String validationCodeStr, @FormParam("remember") boolean longLasted)
      This resource is used to authenticate the user and create a user session. The "session" is only used to identify the user, no other data is stored in the session.
      Parameters:
      username - Username
      password - Password
      longLasted - Remember the user next time, create a long lasted session.
      Returns:
      Response

      Parameters:
